summary.Title: Deputy Director, STRING
summary.Presentation: STRING is a political member organization representing 14,5 million inhabitants across 16 regions and municipalities from Germany, Denmark, Sweden, and Norway. Our mission is to

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
STRING is a political member organization representing 14,5 million inhabitants across 16 regions and municipalities from Germany, Denmark, Sweden, and Norway. Our mission is to accelerate the green transition through transregional connectivity and collaboration, driving green growth and establishing Europe’s leading megaregion.

Role overview:

As Deputy Director of STRING, you will contribute in shaping the future of regional collaboration and sustainable development in Northern Europe. You will support the Managing Director in leading the strategic management of STRING and fostering collaboration among member regions. We’re seeking a dynamic leader with experience in the public sector, a deep understanding of the infrastructure and innovation ecosystem within the STRING Megaregion, along with a strong political acumen.

Key responsibilities:

  • Support the Managing Director in leading strategic initiatives and operations of STRING.
  • Drive political advocacy efforts and initiate projects within the areas of sustainable transport infrastructure, green innovation, and green industry.
  • Cultivate strong relationships with member regions, governmental bodies, industry partners, and other stakeholders.
  • Deliver engaging presentations and represent STRING in various forums and events.
  • Manage a fast-paced environment with multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring timely and high-quality delivery.
  • Foster creativity and innovation within the organization to address complex challenges and opportunities.


Requirements:

  • Master’s degree in a relevant field.
  • At least 10-15 years of work experience.
  • Excellent project management-, budgeting-, and stakeholder engagement skills.
  • Fluency in English and proficiency in at least one of the Nordic languages; additional languages are a plus.
  • In-depth knowledge of infrastructure, innovation, and industry ecosystem within the STRING Megaregion.
  • Excellent interpersonal and rhetorical skills.
  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment with frequent travel requirements.
  • Proven track record of managing multiple projects with creativity and delivering results.


Benefits:

  • Opportunity to lead transformative projects and drive regional collaboration for sustainable development.
  • Dynamic work environment with opportunities for professional growth and development.
  • The chance to make a meaningful impact on the future of Northern Europe as part of a dedicated and passionate team.


If you are a strategic leader with passion for sustainable development and regional collaboration, we encourage you to apply for the position of Deputy Director at STRING. Join us in shaping the future of Europe’s leading megaregion and driving green growth across borders.

Om Region Sjælland
Vi er regionens største arbejdsplads med mere end 19.000 medarbejdere og et budget på 23 mia. kroner. Vi løser opgaver inden for sundhed, psykiatri og regional udvikling og driver en række sociale institutioner. Klik ind på www.regionsjaelland.dk og læs mere om regionens opgaver, struktur og geografi. Du finder os også på Facebook, Twitter og LinkedIn.
